metadata.name: Unusual Parent Process For Cmd.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious parent process for cmd.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\cmd.exe')) AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\csrss.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\ctfmon.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\dllhost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\epad.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\flashplayerupdateservice.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\googleupdate.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\jucheck.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\jusched.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\logonui.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\lsass.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\regsvr32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\searchindexer.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\searchprotocolhost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\sihclient.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\sihost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\slui.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\spoolsv.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\sppsvc.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\taskhostw.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\unsecapp.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\werfault.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\wermgr.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\wlanext.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\wudfhost.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious parent process for cmd.exe
